name: Hatch a Plan
slogan: Take the hassle out of plans with friends
description: Hatch is an iOS app, free to download on the app store. It makes it more convenient to meet up with your friends so you can enjoy more time together.  Work out a) when to meet (by finding a date and time that works for everyone, b) where to meet (by working out equidistant locations) and c) what to do (by suggesting venues) with d) who (by reminding you who you haven't seen in a while). Please see our website for more details.

team.name: Guy Ellis
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder and COO at Hatch a Plan

jobs.title: Marketing manager
jobs.description:
We are looking for a full-time marketing manager to accelerate the growth of Hatch. Hatch is an iOS app, free to download on the app store. It makes it more convenient to meet up with your friends so you can enjoy more time together. 

The app allows you to work out a) when to meet (by finding a date and time that works for everyone, b) where to meet (by working out equidistant locations) and c) what to do (by suggesting venues) with d) who (by reminding you who you haven't seen in a while). Please see our website (www.planhatch.com) for more details. 

In return for helping drive a user-growth strategy, we will provide a generous equity stake allocation. We want whoever comes on board to be passionate about the business and have a real stake in its success.

jobs.title: CTO
jobs.description:
We are looking for a full-time CTO or Lead Developer to accelerate the growth of Hatch. There is a possibility to shape this role as Tech co-founder with equity stake.

Hatch is an iOS app that makes it more convenient and engaging to make plans to meet up with your friends so you can enjoy more time together. 
The app allows you to work out a) when to meet (by finding a date and time that works for everyone, b) where to meet (by working out equidistant locations) and c) what to do (by suggesting venues) with d) who (by reminding you who you haven't seen in a while). Please see our website (www.planhatch.com) for more details. 

The CTO or Lead Developer will take on the critical role of developing the vision of Hatch with the dedicated leadership team and to turn vision into reality.

You will ideally have experience in location based social applications and best practice in iOS and Android front and back end development as well as prototyping. Experience in payment processing is a bonus, but not required. You are a technology visionary who is guided more by what can be than by what is possible.

This is a leadership role as part of small, but dedicated team, consisting of the three founders, a business leader and a head of partnerships.

In return for helping drive a user-growth strategy, we will provide a generous equity stake allocation. We want whoever comes on board to be passionate about the business and have a real stake in its success.
